name: Above the Void
description:
Maneuver around Above the Void by making platforms. Be careful of the enemies approaching trying to destroy your platforms. Whatever you do, don't fall into the void! 

All of the art and sound assets were created in the duration of the week. 

Dragondoodler222 - Programming, Music 

lowof -- Programming, SFX 

geryongames -- Programming, Art

Controls: WASD + Arrow Keys - Movement, Left Mouse Button - Fire, Space - skip text, M - mute music, P - pause, Number Keys + Scroll - Change Bullet
